entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ReadAtLeastAsync cancellation is broken #69649
  • ArrayPool does not resize based on user request #69641
  • [wasm][debugger] Support complex expressions with null-condition #69640
  • wasm][debugger] Refactor evaluateOnCallFrame #69639
  • [API Proposal]: More helper methods for exception types #69637
  • CORINFO_HELP_READYTORUN_STATIC_BASE is emitted twice in some cases #69635

Closed

  • NetworkStream blocks on CopyTo from it #69650
  • Generics return type with explicit layout in PInvoke #37198
    Future
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\NETClients\\Primitives\\NETClientPrimitivesInALC\\NETClientPrimitivesInALC.cmd #68880
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to expose existing runtime EventCounter data #65989
    7.0.0
  • CoClass doesn't mix well with default interface implementations #46993
    7.0.0
  • HWIntrinsics: FMA suboptimal codegen #12212
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Exposing `Radix` and the remaining `Is*` generic-math APIs #69651
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rename and reenable test #69648
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Reenable tests to see if 63746 is fixed. #69646
  • Bump LLVM to 14.x. #69645
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix Create/StartActivity parentId nullability #69636
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Style improvements for generated p/invokes #69638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Profiler RequestReJITWithInliners did not work properly if all methods in the module were not loaded #69634
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move dead code removal in lower after last updategraph #69421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IsSupported guard check for use of Ssse3.Shuffle in Span.Reverse #69623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SystemNative_SendFile on iOS/tvOS devices #69436
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Updating to a version of Roslyn that contains the NumericIntPtr feature #69627
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Consolidate interop tables generators #69620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • optimize BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator #69631
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #69575
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Add CopyString and ValueIsEscaped APIs to Utf8JsonReader #69580
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Draft Optimization for "~x + 1" to "-x" (#69003) #69600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add X509AuthorityInformationAccessExtension #69629
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Switch extra platform coverage from windowsservercore-2004 to windowsservercore-ltsc2019 #69480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve regex derivative construction #69530
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix typos #69537
    area-Meta, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement a an design-time msbuild item to get the missing runtime version in a project. #25575

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Self Constraint #5413
    Likely Never
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Open issues for `ref` fields #6149

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Natively supporting System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting APIs #61445
  • API Additions for Required Members #61444
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • "Make method async" refactoring adds "Async" prefix to ASP.NET Controller methods - making the name invalid #61364
    Backlog
  • Assertion failed in AbstractMergeNestedIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider #56101
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61443
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61449
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow source link, embedded or decompiled source in Peek Definition #61427
    Area-IDE
  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Antiforgery cookie randomly missing #41788
  • StringContent constructors ignore content string #41786
    Discussions
  • Expose OnErrorAsync in ErrorBoundary #41784
  • Rename GroupRouteBuilder to RouteGroupBuilder #41781
  • Trying to access IWebHostEnvironment in a class library, referenced by my web project #41780

Closed

  • Bundling JS modules #41746

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark `OpenApi` PRs with `area-web-frameworks` #41787
    area-infrastructure
  • Support multiple calls to WithTags in WithOpenApi #41779
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Remove outdated comments HostingApplicationDiagnostics #41778
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Make SignalR Redis test thread-safe #41564
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add SignalR client results to Java client #41774
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Add logging to M.E.Caching.StackExchangeRedis #41769
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks
  • Remove unused directory in ANCM installers #41693
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Feature Request] Allows EventSourceLogger in MEL to defer to in-proc MEL logger config #819
    7.0.0
  • Feature: Support Percentiles and multi-dimension metrics in dotnet-counters #2368
    7.0.0

Updated

  • dotnet dump creates empty file for process not running managed code #3064
    7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Folders locked by WebViewHost.exe and adb.exe #7397
  • [iOS] Attempting to JIT compile method InitializeComponent while running in aot-only mode. #7396
  • Adding more than 16 controls on a page makes the TAB order wrong in Windows. #7395
  • Command is missing on Checkbox control #7394
  • [Windows] Connectivity changed on throws an exception and sometimes crashes the app #7393
  • BlazorWebView: Uncaught SyntaxError: Identifier 'channel' has already been declared. #7392
  • The style of is CollectionView selected item incorrect #7391
  • [Maui Blazor] App becomes unresponsive when dragging and dropping text outside the window. #7390

Closed

  • IPhone not detected #7323

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow the image handler to measure more accurately WRT aspect ratio #7389

Updated

  • Remove the padding around checkboxes #7379
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.3xx-sr1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Many-to-many UsingEntity with custom join object #28074
  • Migrations: deleting an index with a long and truncated name results in renaming collision #28073

Closed

  • Subclassing DbContext Duplicates Migration Changes #28049
  • Using DbCommand with TransactionScope on an open connection does not create an active transaction. #28066
  • Projection to SQL fails while using Math.Floor with LINQ Sum expression #27124
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Query: Assign correct type/typemapping to result of Round on SqlServer #28068
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Query: Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC #28070
